actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-1037.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill H.R. 3236 to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide better work incentives and improved accountability in the disability insurance program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Waives certain points of order against the conference report on H.R. 3236 (Disability insurance program).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on the bill H.R. 3236 to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide better work incentives and improved accountability in the disability insurance program, and for other purposes.
